ComicInfo.Summary:
Years before World War II, the Japanese continue to formulate their plan for world dominance, developing cutting edge weapons including a new tank that will give them give them a distinct advantage in ground warfare. But Cassidy O'Hara and her band of guerilla fighters have other plans for this ultimate weapon as they stage a daring raid on the tank factory. But are they making the right call or walking straight into a trap?
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Billy Tucci & Ivan Nunes | 1 | B | Cover B | Pasquale Qualano & Stephen Schaffer | 2 | C | Cover C | Franchesco! | 3 | RE | Zenescope Retailer Exclusive "Retro" Cover, Limited to 500 Copies | Franchesco! | 4 |
